channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 周五，爱尔兰在阿布扎比以六个小门的优势击败阿富汗，终于赢得了他们的首场测试赛，结束了七连败。
item.description:
Ireland finally won their first Test match on Friday when they defeated Afghanistan by six wickets in Abu Dhabi, ending a streak of seven successive losses.#AFPSports https://t.co/BKBg0UAdBk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：雄伟的东京市政府总部大楼现在是世界上最大的永久性投影地图显示屏的所在地。
item.description:
VIDEO: The imposing towers of Tokyo's city government headquarters are now home to the world's largest permanent projection mapping display. pic.twitter.com/g0hA0mUA83

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 红牛车队负责人克里斯蒂安-霍纳（Christian Horner）周五再次承受压力，因为据称他与一名女性工作人员之间的私人信息被泄露给了一级方程式赛车官员和记者。
item.description:
Red Bull team principal Christian Horner was under renewed pressure on Friday after private messages allegedly between him and a female staff member were leaked to Formula One officials and journalists.#AFPSports https://t.co/dzWxASUGjq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 周五，在孟加拉国最大医院的停尸房外，悲痛欲绝的家属们守候在那里，等待亲人的遗体得到确认。
item.description:
Anguished families kept vigil outside the morgue of Bangladesh's largest hospital on Friday, waiting for the bodies of loved ones to be identified after a fire they say should never have happened.https://t.co/fM4cBsjm91

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：澳大利亚极北地区的保护工作帮助咸水掠食者从濒临灭绝的边缘挣扎回来，这项独特的计划让有鳞掠食者与澳大利亚北领地的当地人共存。
item.description:
VIDEO: Conservation efforts in Australia's far north are credited with helping wrestle the saltwater predators back from the verge of extinction, with a unique program that allow the scaly predators to coexist with the locals in Australia's Northern Territory. pic.twitter.com/easdbgfx7m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：得克萨斯州正在扑灭其历史上最大的野火。这场大火已造成至少两人死亡，烧毁了美国南部一百万英亩的土地。#AFPVertical📸 🎥 格林维尔消防救援队/FacebookFlower Mound 消防队
item.description:
VIDEO: Texas is battling the largest wildfire in its history. The blaze has killed at least two people and scorched a million acres in the southern US state. #AFPVertical
📸 🎥 Greenville Fire Rescue/Facebook
Flower Mound Fire Department pic.twitter.com/i5L2BNWby9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：大约 180 年前，得克萨斯州曾是一个独立国家，现在有一群人希望恢复这一地位，主张与美国离婚，他们称之为 "Texit"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Texas, last an independent country around 180 years ago, now boasts a pocket of people who want that status back, advocating a divorce from the United States they call "Texit" pic.twitter.com/ofK71BH7Pv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 丹妮尔-格什科维奇说："知道他错过了多少，失去了多少时间，真是令人痛心。"她的哥哥埃文是《华尔街日报》的一名记者，因被控从事间谍活动而被关押在俄罗斯，但他断然否认了这一指控。
item.description:
VIDEO: "It's devastating to know how much he's missed, how much time he's lost," says Danielle Gershkovich, whose brother Evan, a reporter with the Wall Street Journal, is being detained in Russia on espionage charges that he categorically denies. pic.twitter.com/7Ao85oxocw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：为重振低迷的房地产市场，香港取消了三大房地产交易税，推翻了十多年前为抑制投机和控制高房价而推出的措施。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hong Kong has axed three major property transaction taxes in a bid to revive its depressed housing market, reversing measures introduced more than a decade ago to curb speculation and rein in sky-high prices. pic.twitter.com/lKxv5g5Jkj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 本周图片（2 月 24 日至 3 月 1 日）#AFP
item.description:
PICTURES OF THE WEEK (24 February - 01 March)#AFP https://t.co/u60lCbGLdB pic.twitter.com/izY1kSYKBh

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 1, 2024

item.title: 蕾哈娜和 Meta 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格周五在印度参加了由亚洲首富举办的奢华婚前派对，预计其他具有全球影响力的人物也将参加庆祝活动。
item.description:
Rihanna and Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg were in India Friday for an extravagant pre-wedding party hosted by Asia's richest man, with celebrations expected to include other globally influential figures.https://t.co/brHbcnTLi8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 欧盟首席检察官在接受法新社采访时说，有组织犯罪团伙正在从风险较高的贩毒活动转向诈骗活动，许多犯罪团伙毫不犹豫地使用暴力来保护自己的活动。
item.description:
Organised criminal groups are switching from riskier drug rackets to fraud in the EU and many don't hesitate to use violence to protect their activities, the bloc's chief prosecutor told AFP in an interview.https://t.co/nwBWYSYmWD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: #欧元区 2 月份通胀率进一步降至 2.6
item.description:
#BREAKING Eurozone inflation dips further to 2.6% in February pic.twitter.com/pnizbBEUm1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：加拿大城市蒙特利尔正经历着近乎夏天般的酷热，气温高达 15 摄氏度，尽管冬天尚未过去。
item.description:
VIDEO: The Canadian city of Montreal is experiencing almost summer-like heat, with temperatures hitting 15 degrees Celsius, even though winter is not yet over. pic.twitter.com/qTARR2Fh6y

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 联合国周五表示，到2060年，地球自然资源的开采量可能激增60%，危及气候目标和经济繁荣。
item.description:
Extraction of Earth's natural resources could surge 60 percent by 2060, imperilling climate goals and economic prosperity, the UN said Friday, calling for dramatic changes in energy, food, transport and housing.https://t.co/KDATIwaWjl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：环保活动人士搭建营地，占领柏林郊外的一片森林，阻止特斯拉汽车工厂的扩张。
item.description:
VIDEO: Environmental activists build a camp, occupying a forest outside Berlin to stop the expansion of a Tesla car factory. pic.twitter.com/RRmxKZEj0D

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频：在黎巴嫩南部边境，真主党和以色列几乎每天都在交火，数百名黎巴嫩人在贝鲁特北部的一个豪华滑雪胜地的纯白斜坡上滑行，他们急切地想从加沙战争的新闻中解脱出来。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hundreds of Lebanese glide on pristine white slopes at a luxury ski resort north of Beirut, eager to disconnect from news of the war in Gaza as Hezbollah and Israel exchange near-daily fire on Lebanon's southern border. pic.twitter.com/ZVakvUNvLw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 流行歌星蕾哈娜和 Meta 公司总裁马克-扎克伯格等名人参加了亚洲首富穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）在印度举办的派对。为期三天的庆祝活动是穆克什-安巴尼的儿子阿南特（Anant）和未婚妻拉迪卡-莫森特（Radhika Merchant）精心准备的婚前仪式的一部分。
item.description:
Pop star Rihanna and Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg among celebrities at party in India hosted by Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani.

The three-day celebrations are part of an elaborate pre-wedding ceremony for his son Anant and fiancee Radhika Merchanthttps://t.co/dC26CelrHH pic.twitter.com/vhUY3SHslN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频： 环保活动人士占据了柏林附近特斯拉工厂附近的一片森林，他们表示要阻止这家汽车制造商在德国的扩张计划，并保护当地的地下水。
item.description:
VIDEO: Environmental activists occupying a forest close to Tesla's factory near Berlin say they want to stop the vehicle maker's German expansion plans and protect local groundwater pic.twitter.com/8QpZB9KvA4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 伦敦地铁网络正在举行自大流行病以来的首次巴士艺人选拔赛，为该市每天 350 万名乘客带来娱乐和欢乐。
item.description:
Underground search for buskers.

The London Underground network is holding its first auditions since the pandemic for buskers to keep the city's 3.5 million daily travellers entertained and upliftedhttps://t.co/HvsvnnWxA3 pic.twitter.com/hyV6HJc9Gb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: Facebook 母公司 Meta 表示将不再向澳大利亚媒体公司支付新闻费用
item.description:
Facebook parent Meta says it will no longer pay Australian media companies for newshttps://t.co/rKPUm0XZNg pic.twitter.com/11DJJGYnA5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 农民们用拖拉机和一捆捆干草堵住了巴黎著名的凯旋门纪念碑周围的交通，称抗议活动旨在 "拯救法国农业"。
item.description:
Farmers blocked traffic around Paris's famed Arc de Triomphe monument with tractors and bales of hay, saying the protest was aimed "at saving French agriculture"https://t.co/4oGgEN5ggc pic.twitter.com/LYTWP7OPxZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 佳士得拍卖行称，从眼镜到班克斯的三联画，埃尔顿-约翰的 900 多件藏品和艺术品在本月的几次拍卖会上拍出了 2,000 多万美元的高价。
item.description:
Elton John items fetch more than $20 million at New York auction.

From glasses to a Banksy triptych, a collection of more than 900 items and artworks belonging to Elton John fetched more than $20 million at several auctions this month, Christie's sayshttps://t.co/pkX238Xrj8 pic.twitter.com/Yr0MHTnQYk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 近万名初级医生因政府计划增加医学院招生人数以应对医生短缺和老龄化社会而罢工。
item.description:
South Korean police raid Medical Association offices over doctors strike.

Nearly 10,000 junior doctors are striking over government plans to increase medical school admissions to cope with shortages and an ageing societyhttps://t.co/bmuCO5h7c5 pic.twitter.com/Nuln0l6xvT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 国防部称黑客从台湾最大的电信公司窃取了包括军事和政府文件在内的 "敏感信息"，并在暗网上出售
item.description:
Hackers stole "sensitive information" including military and government documents from Taiwan's largest telecom company and sold it on the dark web, defence ministry sayshttps://t.co/XGcglUX3wB pic.twitter.com/X9DWLWnTI1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 梅-布里特-科德（May-Britt Koed）说："我甚至不知道自己是什么时候出生的，"她是自 20 世纪 50 年代以来被送往国外收养的 25 万名韩国婴儿之一：
item.description:
"I don't even know when I was born," says May-Britt Koed, one of the quarter of a million South Korean babies sent abroad for adoption since the 1950s.

Victims of Denmark's adoption scandal demand answers: https://t.co/rtMGS6951d pic.twitter.com/FFlTbs68Kj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的葬礼将于周五在莫斯科举行，送葬者将冒着被捕的危险前往吊唁。
item.description:
The funeral of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is to be held in Moscow Friday, with mourners risking arrest to pay their respects.

Navalny's spokeswoman says funeral directors had received threatening calls warning them not to transport his bodyhttps://t.co/5tLLOvJJu1 pic.twitter.com/ew9EHkEi6B

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 根据《柳叶刀》医学杂志发布的研究报告，目前全球有超过 10 亿人患有肥胖症。
item.description:
More than one billion people around the world are now suffering from obesity, study says.

The number has more than quadrupled since 1990, according to the study released by the Lancet medical journalhttps://t.co/wOKTf9JQN3 pic.twitter.com/YLhbr1MSZ4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 日本棒球巨星大谷翔平让球迷猜测新婚妻子的身份--称她是 "一个普通的日本人"
item.description:
Japanese baseball superstar Shohei Ohtani keeps fans guessing on identity of new wife - says she is "a normal Japanese person"https://t.co/Bdn5ruFByx pic.twitter.com/9vCkioeO72

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 视频德克萨斯州是 200 年前的一个独立国家，现在有一部分人希望恢复这一地位，主张分离，他们称之为 Texit
item.description:
VIDEO Texas, an independent country 200 years ago, now boasts a pocket of people who want that status back, advocating a separation they call Texit pic.twitter.com/gzy2JITE4L

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024
